oai_dc:dc.dc:title: State of Metro Address, by Mayor Richard H. Fulton, March 28, 1985
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A typescript "media copy" of "Mayor Reflects on Decade of Progress ... Looks Forward to Decade of Promise; State of Metro Address, March 28, 1985, Sheraton Music City Hotel, Mayor Richard H. Fulton." Forms part of Mayor Richard H. Fulton Papers, Speeches. 1 typescript
